shri lanka krikat kandayame kal damana lada simbabwe test sancharaya wenuwata shri lanka krikat aayathanaya wisin sanwidhana kala thunkon siwudina krikat tharagawaliye shurathawa dinaganimata krikat sabhapathige pila samathwiya.kolambaa es.es.si pitiyedi eeye nimawata pathwu shri lanka ‘ee’ pila ha krikat sabhapathige pila athara tharagaya jaya parajayen thorawa awasan wuwath palamu inime jaya labu krikat sabhapathige pila tharagawaliye prasada lakunu satahane peramuna ganimin shurayan bawata pathwiya.palamu tharagayedi menma eeye nimawu tharagayedi shathakayak wartha karamin tharagawaliye wadima lakunu labhiyawu kumar sangakkara tharagaye wiraya lesa nam kerini.shri lanka krikat sabhapathige pila siya palamu inimata lakunu 501k ras kala athara shri lanka ‘ee’ kandayama palamu inime di lakunu 125kata dawi giyeya.
